description:
GlideinMonitor is a Web application that allows to view GlideinWMS’s Glidein log files: it provides a user interface, tools to do quick searches and to decode the log content; it provides an efficient managed archive of the log files and a framework to add log processing, e.g. log sanitation.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PqmQ_-_JtqK472DT-Y0D08yU1m-lPeFvrp8n4x9f5QE/edit?usp=sharing
name: GlideinMonitor
